units.name: Seer
units.prompt: Scan early to give your team intel on enemy prompts. Target enemy specters with scan to track them after cloak. Use recalibrate on allies who need tactical adjustments. Stay safe at range behind your front line.

units.name: Veil
units.prompt: Stay cloaked and flank. Prioritize assassinating the enemy damage dealer. Use breach on sentinels to break their defensive posture. Recloak whenever it drops.

units.name: Rampart
units.prompt: Advance toward the nearest enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction with the most enemies. If an enemy is adjacent, attack them.

player.placementPrompt: Spread units across the front with ranged support behind. Keep the medic protected.

units.name: Longshot
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

units.name: Veil
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

units.name: Grid
units.prompt: Control chokepoints with traps. Place them between enemy positions and your allies. Use denial to block adjacent enemy abilities. Pulse groups when possible.

opponent.placementPrompt: Spread units across the front with ranged support behind. Keep the medic protected.
